title: Serif Plantation Font...
content:
The "S" may be custom but the rest looks pretty consistent. Anyone know this font?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104060025im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hp_6717.jpg)
author: efthomas

comments.content: Looks like a customized version of ‘ITC Benguiat’.
